Question
========
  
The effect of an intervention is tested using a randomly drawn sample from the population. Evaluate the statements below.  I.   The larger the sample, the more likely it is that the H0 will be unfairly rejected. II.  The larger the sample, the greater the effect of the intervention.

  
Answerlist
----------
* Utterance I is correct, utterance II is incorrect.
* Utterance I is incorrect, utterance II is correct.
* Both utterances are correct.
* Both statements are incorrect.
